translations: n.[脊椎] 叶猴（一种长尾猴）

phrs.translation: 长尾猴, 长尾叶猴, 长尾癯猴
黑叶猴, 白颊黑叶猴
长尾叶猴, 哈努曼叶猴, 喜山长尾叶猴
越南金丝猴, 东京仰鼻猴

sentences.sentence: The interrelation of habitat factors of white headed langur has also been stud.
sentences.translation: 并研究白头叶猴生境因子之间的相关性。

sentences.sentence: Old World monkeys: guenon; baboon; colobus monkey; langur; macaque; mandrill; mangabey; patas; proboscis monkey.
sentences.translation: 旧域猴；长尾猴；狒狒；疣猴；叶猴；短尾猴；山魈；白眉猴；长鼻猴。

sentences.sentence: Passengers had to be moved to another car while staff chased the dexterous creature, causing delays. the langur was being employed to prevent more such problems.
sentences.translation: 当地铁工作人员在车厢内追逐这只机灵的动物时，乘客不得已被转入另一节车厢，最后导致列车延误。
